GET /memberships.description: List memberships of accounts the user can access.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

count.description: Total number of results for the requested service

page.description: Current page within paginated list of results

per_page.description: Number of results per page of results

total_count.description: Total results available without any search parameters

created_on.description: Timestamp for the creation of the account

default_nameservers.description:
Specifies the default nameservers to be used for new zones added to this account.

- `cloudflare.standard` for Cloudflare-branded nameservers
- `custom.account` for account custom nameservers
- `custom.tenant` for tenant custom nameservers

See [Custom Nameservers](https://developers.cloudflare.com/dns/additional-options/custom-nameservers/)
for more information.

enforce_twofactor.description:
Indicates whether membership in this account requires that
Two-Factor Authentication is enabled

use_account_custom_ns_by_default.description:
Indicates whether new zones should use the account-level custom
nameservers by default.

Deprecated in favor of `default_nameservers`.

api_access_enabled.description: Enterprise only. Indicates whether or not API access is enabled specifically for this user on a given account.

code.description: The unique activation code for the account membership.

permissions.description: All access permissions for the user at the account.

roles.description: List of role names for the user at the account.
